participant_1.background:
I dressed up as a cat last Halloween.
My appearance is not that important to me, as I would rather focus on my passions and relationships.
I enjoy my job but would like more time to sleep.
My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer.
I'm interested in learning more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden.

participant_2.background:
I love my mother more than words can say.
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.
i really enjoy making friends.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Doing great! I'm a personal trainer, and I love my job.
That sounds like an awesome job! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Yeah, I love helping people achieve their fitness goals.
That's great! I'm trying to get healthier myself.
That's great to hear! What are you doing to get healthy?
I'm eating healthier and exercising more.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll reach your goals.
Thanks! I'm trying.
What's your favorite food?
I love watermelon! It's so sweet and refreshing.
I love watermelon too! It's the perfect summer fruit.
I agree! Do you have any hobbies?
I love making friends and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like making friends too.
It's the best! What are your favorite things to do with your friends?
I love going to concerts, playing sports, and hanging out.
Those sound like a lot of fun! I love going to concerts too.
They are! I love the atmosphere and the music.
Me too! I love getting lost in the music.
